name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ZuckMaster - Save Ads - FB Ad Library

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save ads from Facebook with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ZuckMaster is the #1 way to save and download HD ads from the Facebook Ad Library with just 1 click. Get total visibility into each ad’s performance and supercharge your product research—no fuss, no clutter!

⚡ Key Features ⚡
	•	🚀 One-Click Download
Download any ad directly from the Facebook Ad Library to your device.
	•	💎 HD Quality
Whether it’s video or image, grab the original file uploaded by the advertiser.
	•	💰 Show Ad Spend
Instantly see how much advertisers are spending on their ads—just click “Show All Ad Spends” to view the spend for every ad as you scroll.
	•	📊 Sort Ads by Ad Spend
Easily find top-performing ads by sorting your search results based on ad spend.
	•	🔎 Filter Active Ads by Number of Ads
Want to focus on advertisers running a lot of ads? Set a minimum threshold to only view the big spenders.
	•	👁 Track Pages
Click “Track Page” to view all ads running for a specific page, and use “Show All Ad Spend” to identify the best performers in seconds.
	•	⏳ Running Since
Filter ads by the minimum running days to spot those long-running, proven winners.
	•	📝 Download Ad Details
See the ad copy, title, description, link (with UTM), and page details (ID, name, like count, category, etc.)—all the crucial info you need in one click, totally free!

Why ZuckMaster?

From HD downloads to ad spend tracking, ZuckMaster is your all-in-one solution for in-depth product research and hassle-free ad downloads. Save your Time & Money, forget about paid storage limits, complicated tools, or tedious manual processes—no account needed and you own your data. With just one click, ZuckMaster delivers original, full-quality ads directly to your machine FAST, giving you the insights you need to outsmart the competition.

Ready to level up your ad library game?
Install ZuckMaster and start saving and analyzing Facebook ads like a pro! ✨
